original_text: When the camp is to move, Aaron and his sons are to go in and take down the shielding curtain and put it over the ark of the covenant law.
korean_text: 진영이 전진할 때에 아론과 그의 아들들이 들어가서 칸 막는 휘장을 걷어 증거궤를 덮고

sentences.original_text: When the camp is to move
Aaron and his sons are to go in
put it over the ark of the covenant law
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 언약 법궤 위에 덮어야 한다
